backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining publication status controls, access checks, user roles, and extensive type definitions for profiles, lessons, assignments, and report cards.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing premium pricing–related frontend files, components, and test IDs for Stripe checkout behavior and UI price formatting.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries outlining the purpose of each frontend file, including routing, UI components, premium features, and backend communication hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document configuring PWA metadata, Apple touch icons, splash settings, and the root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest describing app metadata, icons, categories, and display settings for Homeschool Hub K‑12.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling install, activate, cache management, offline behavior, and fetch strategies for static and dynamic assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app configuring routing, theme, query client, authentication flow, publication checks, and conditional rendering for dashboard, setup, and landing screens.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublication: Admin UI for publishing or unpublishing the app with status display and reason input.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentsTab.t: Displays student assignments and provides teachers options to assign lessons, grade, and manage submissions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, authentication controls, and offline indicator.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Manages PWA installation prompts for web and iOS, including dismissal and standalone checks.
frontend/src/components/LessonPlansTab.t: Lists and filters lesson plans and allows teachers to create new lesson plans from scratch or library.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Shows temporary online/offline status alerts based on PWA connectivity.
Multi-step onboarding modal guiding teachers or students, with localStorage tracking and dynamic step content.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBanner.ts: Shows a premium upsell alert when the user lacks premium access, with an upgrade button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form that sets name and role, with role defaults based on sign‑in type and save mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressTab.tsx: Displays assignment completion stats and grade averages for a student using fetched assignment data.
frontend/src/components/ReportCardsTab.t: Manages report card display and generation, premium access checks, Stripe checkout, and subscription cancellation.
frontend/src/components/RoleSignInButton: Provides educator/parent or student sign‑in options, storing selected role and triggering II login.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Modal form for entering Stripe secret key and allowed countries, submitting configuration via mutation.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Exports app name, short name, and tagline for centralized branding.
frontend/src/constants/premiumPricing.ts: Defines constants for premium report card pricing and provides a helper to generate checkout items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Builds and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWA.ts: Tracks PWA install status, online/offline state, and detects service worker updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, subjects, roles, and app publication.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and utility classes for scrolling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AppStorePreview.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the App Store preview page.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tabs for lessons, assignments, progress, and report cards, including onboarding and premium banner logic.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing landing page with hero content, features, and sign-in options based on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentCancel.tsx: Shows a cancellation message when a payment fails and provides navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Confirms successful payment, refreshes premium access state, and links users back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Takedown.tsx: Presents a maintenance or takedown notice with optional reason details and admin controls.
frontend/src/utils/signInType.ts: Manages storing, retrieving, and clearing the user's sign‑in type in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state, architecture notes, and a list of existing features for role-specific sign-in, maintenance mode, and publishing controls. Captures versioning, known issues, and requirements metadata.
